-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Class and combinators for expressing membership in type-level containers
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/mstksg/elem#readme</a>
@package elem
@version 0.1.0.0

module Data.Type.Elem
data Any p as
[Any] :: Elem f as a -> p @@ a -> Any p as
class Search f
search :: forall k (p :: k ~> Type) (as :: f k). Search f => (forall a. Sing a -> Decision (p @@ a)) -> Sing as -> Decision (Any p as)
newtype All p (as :: f k)
All :: forall a. Elem f as a -> p @@ a -> All p
[runAll] :: All p -> forall a. Elem f as a -> p @@ a
class Verify f
verify :: forall k (p :: k ~> Type) (as :: f k). Verify f => (forall a. Sing a -> Decision (p @@ a)) -> Sing as -> Decision (All p as)
data Index :: [k] -> k -> Type
[IZ] :: Index (a : as) a
[IS] :: Index bs a -> Index (b : bs) a
data IsJust :: Maybe k -> k -> Type
[IsJust] :: IsJust ( 'Just a) a
data NEIndex :: NonEmpty k -> k -> Type
[NEHead] :: NEIndex (a :| as) a
[NETail] :: Index as a -> NEIndex (b :| as) a
data Snd :: (j, k) -> k -> Type
[Snd] :: Snd '(a, b) b
instance Data.Type.Elem.Search ((,) j)
instance Data.Type.Elem.Verify ((,) j)
instance Data.Type.Elem.Search GHC.Base.NonEmpty
instance Data.Type.Elem.Verify GHC.Base.NonEmpty
instance Data.Type.Elem.Search GHC.Base.Maybe
instance Data.Type.Elem.Verify GHC.Base.Maybe
instance Data.Type.Elem.Search []
instance Data.Type.Elem.Verify []

module Lib
someFunc :: IO ()
